titles.title: Nunn-Lugar Global Cooperative Threat Reduction Improvement Act of 2011
A bill to modify the authority to use Cooperative Threat Reduction funds for proliferation threat reduction projects and activities outside the states of the former Soviet Union.
Nunn-Lugar Global Cooperative Threat Reduction Improvement Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Nunn-Lugar Global Cooperative Threat Reduction Improvement Act of 2011 - Amends the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2004 relating to the authority of the Department of Defense (DOD) to use Cooperative Threat Reduction funds for a nuclear proliferation threat reduction project or activity outside of states of the former Soviet Union to remove the requirement for the concurrence of the Secretary of State before the exercise of such authority.
